situation.title: Struggle for Freedom and Democracy Day

content.processed:
Recommendations

Gatherings, which have been approved by relevant authorities, is limited to 100 participants during memorial events on November 17th, in groups of a maximum of 20 participants and at least two meters apart. 

The organizers of some events have already announced their transfer online or their cancelling. If you regularly attend a similar event, visit the organizers' website for more information.

situation_type.name: CURRENT EVENTS: Velvet Revolution Remembrance Day
